img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game set in a snowy, ancient temple environment. A character is seen from behind, holding a staff or weapon, facing a large stone structure with intricate carvings and statues. The setting features stone steps leading up to the temple, with snow covering parts of the ground and structures. A red arrow points towards a specific area on the left side of the steps, possibly indicating a point of interest or a path to follow. The atmosphere is serene yet foreboding, suggesting a moment of exploration or confrontation.
